page.title: 11MOSSTOWIE SCHOOL
page.content: There are eight on the register at the moment.The playschool is very popular with the children and the mothers because it is preparing them for school. Most people would like to see more sports held in and around the hall and a better variety of clubs for old and young people.Most people think facilities are adequate but some would like better accommodation and extra facilities such as a full time caretaker or a bar. Nearly everyone in our area uses the hall on a regular basis. Mosstowie School. It is located 4 miles South West of Elgin.The original building was built in 1875 and an extension was added with two classrooms and a diningroom in 1970.
